page.title: 02Public Transport / Badgers
page.content:
Public transport is of great concern to people in this block.Whiteshill, Slad and Painswick all have bus services ,but over the last few last years they have been greatly cut back,mostly to only 2 services a day. There is great concern over the governments bill for privatisation of the buses,which many people think will mean loss of bus services.On certain days of the week the County Council runs a community bus to Stroud for shopping.This is very popular with mothers with young children,elderly people and those without transport.
People are worried that badgers could die out in the Pitchcombe area due to Ministry control and illegal trapping In 1982 gassing was carried out.Now this is not so but badgers are still affected by Ministry Control.
